00017 #include "MC2Coordinate.h"
00018 #include "MC2String.h"

00020 namespace EventFinder {
00021 
00025 class Venue {
00026 public:
00027    typedef MC2String IDType;
00028    inline Venue();
00029    inline Venue( const IDType& id,
00030                  const MC2String& name,
00031                  const MC2String& address,
00032                  const MC2Coordinate& position );
00033 
00035    inline const MC2Coordinate& getCoordinate() const;
00037    inline const MC2String& getName() const;
00039    inline const IDType& getID() const;
00041    inline const MC2String& getAddress() const;
00042 
00043    inline void setID( const IDType& id );
00044    
00045 private:
00046    MC2Coordinate m_coord; 
00047    MC2String m_name; 
00048    IDType m_id; 
00049    MC2String m_address; 
00050 };
00051 
00052 inline bool operator < ( const Venue& lhs, const Venue& rhs ) {
00053    return lhs.getID() < rhs.getID();
00054 }
00055 
00056 struct VenueIDCompare {
00057    bool operator ()( const Venue* lhs, const Venue* rhs ) const {
00058       return *lhs < *rhs;
00059    }
00060 
00061    bool operator () ( const Venue::IDType& id, const Venue* rhs ) const {
00062       return id < rhs->getID();
00063    }
00064 
00065    bool operator () ( const Venue* lhs, const Venue::IDType& id ) const {
00066       return lhs->getID() < id;
00067    }
00068 };
00069 
00070 Venue::Venue( const IDType& id,
00071               const MC2String& name,
00072               const MC2String& address,
00073               const MC2Coordinate& position ):
00074    m_coord( position ),
00075    m_name( name ),
00076    m_id( id ),
00077    m_address( address )
00078 {
00079 }
00080 
00081 inline Venue::Venue():
00082    m_coord(),
00083    m_name(),
00084    m_id( 0 ),
00085    m_address() {
00086 }
00087 
00088 inline const MC2Coordinate& Venue::getCoordinate() const {
00089    return m_coord;
00090 }
00091 
00092 inline const MC2String& Venue::getName() const {
00093    return m_name;
00094 }
00095 
00096 inline const Venue::IDType& Venue::getID() const {
00097    return m_id;
00098 }
00099 
00100 inline const MC2String& Venue::getAddress() const {
00101    return m_address;
00102 }
00103 
00104 inline void Venue::setID( const IDType& id ) {
00105    m_id = id;
00106 }
